targets.expr: hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{ job="springboot-demo-app", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{ job="springboot-demo-app", pool="$hikaricp"}

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{ job="springboot-demo-app", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{ job="springboot-demo-app", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])
